content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed looking out the window (which faces north)at 10:40pm cst on fourth of july.  there were no planes in the sky.  all of a sudden, i saw this bright red circular/oval shaped object. it was if it appeared out of nowhere.  it was headed south (straight to our house)and then abruptly stopped.  it stopped for maybe 20-30 seconds and then changed direction and went northwest.  it was at the altitude of a "normal" plane.  throughout the sighting, it would turn/flash gold and then become red again.  it was not a plane - looked nothing like it.  the entire sighting lasted about 2-3 minutes.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a red circular/oval object (larger than a plane) going south and then abruptly stop.  it changed direction and went nw and disappeared.  throughout sighting, it flashed gold light.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i where enjoying the night sky. conditions where clear and the view of the cosmos was great. timeframe was from about 1:30am to 4:30am c/t. we lay back on the hood of the car watching several meteors 5-20min apart. as we watched starlike balls of light moved throught the sky. not quite sure of altitude or speed, but if i were to guess i would say upper atmoshere or space and traveling at least 20 miles in about 5 seconds when not hovering. one appeared out of the star cluster then traveled north out of view. another appeared about an hour later with similar but different properties in that the object luminated "glowing whitish blue". then when i pointed at it,"almost like it saw me camoflaged  itself by almost totally decreasing its visability, but was still in view. the oject did this three times moving southwest. there was a third and fourth appearance a few hours later on stayed solid glow the other seeming more cautious towards revealing itself only putting off a dim glow with instances of "bright light".
content.summary: Glowing balls of light appearing out of nowhere, fading, moving, reappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking in a residential neighborhood last night, july 13, 2011, around 8:30 pm.  i looked up and saw a silvery object in the sky. it looked like a bullet or a missle, but was more rounded in the front. it was moving as quickly as an airplane would and was flying about as high as a helicopter would fly.  i kept staring at it, trying to figure out what it could be.  of course, i didn't have my iphone, so i didn't get a photo.  the object was coming from the west, i was walking toward it.  it was heading east or southeast.  i walked about half a block, watching it.  there was no one else around on the street at that moment.  i didn't feel any fear, just curiosity.  there were no wings on this craft.  there was no trail behind it.  there was no noise.  there was no lights on it.  after a couple of minutes, a large tree obstructed my view of the craft.  i waited for the object to clear the tree, but it did not.  i walked around the tree, looking up in the sky, trying to find the object, but it was gone. i stood there for a few minutes, to see if it would reappear, but it never did.  i can not imagine what happened to it.  it just disappeared.  

i checked the nasa website to see if it was the space station.  according to the schedule, the space station wasn't visible here in frankfort, ky on that day, and won't be for several days, when it will be visible in the early morning.  

i have never seen a ufo before.  i don't know if that was a ufo, but i have no explanation for it.  thanks!
content.summary: I saw a silver object, like a bullet but rounder in front, coming from the west.  there were no wings, no lights, no chem trail from behind it.  it was moving towards the east, or south east.  it disappeared from my view, due to a large tree, then disappe

content.detailedDescription:
I was at oak street beach in chicago on tuesday, june 28, 2011 between 11 am and 1 pm. while relaxing and lying down on the beach near the water, i saw a white orb/circle/disc glide out of a white cloud in the east over lake michigan. it was in the area of the sun because i had to block the direct sunlight in order to see it. i watched as it traveled quickly at a downward angle to the south until it was out of view. this happened at least three more times in the same area. when i tried to record with my phone, i didn't spot any more orbs. 
i watched eye floaters, birds, helicopters, and airplanes that same morning, these were nothing like any of them. they looked just like the london orbs recorded recently.
content.summary: White orbs over chicago's lakefront

content.detailedDescription: My boy friend and i where traveling in the car on the way to fort benton. we both noticed it out the front windshield. at first i thought it was just a star but it got much bright and bigger.(about 3 times bigger and brighter)then it went back to looking like a star again and moved to the right until i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Star=like

content.detailedDescription:
Last evening we had an odd weather evening with 1/2 the sky in very dark cloud base and rain and 1/2 clear and sunny. the rain was moving to the east from my home. just after 6:00 pm, i noticed a very, very bright light moving slowly from south to north, approximately 1 mile from me. it stood out due to the dark cloud backdrop. the cloud ceiling was low and this was moving just under them. i watched it for a full 20 minutes from my garage and when it went behind a tree, i went out onto the deck and watched it for a little more. it then stopped, then disappeared.

i've been in aerospace/aircraft manufacturing for 37 years and am familiar with just about every type of craft. a quick estimate of the distance across the field, from first sight to last is about 300 feet. so, no fixed wing craft can travel that slow and if it were a helicopter, it would have had to hover and side slip with a powerful light on the nose. all being pointless of course. no noise was heard. i guess the object was about 3 to 4 feet in diameter. imagine venus at it's closest point on a clear night for a measure of brightness.

about 10 minutes after it blinked out, 2 navy jets from whidbey flew over, so "someone" else knew it was there!
content.summary: Very bright, slow moving sphere

content.detailedDescription: I came home from an errand when i lived in the unca area and parked outside in our driveway.  i felt the urge to look up - perhaps caught something from the corner of my eye - i don't know.  it was a perfect circle, red/orange in color - glowing red/orange, like a hot electric stove-top kind of color (but the light of it was contained in the circle and didn't "shine," if that makes sense - a dull glow). it was moving due north across the sky during the afternoon.  it was fall or winter (about 10 years ago, so i don't have fresh details). the sky was completely covered in grey clouds, so the object was below the cloud cover.  hard to tell how high up it was.  i am estimating it was about 1/2" or slightly less in diameter from my pov.  it moved at a steady, medium pace for several seconds (not fast, not really slow), then suddenly shot forward incredibly fast so it looked like a straight line of red/orange then just as suddenly disappeared.  i would say from my pov the "streak" lasted only about two-three inches before it disappeared from sight.  overall, including the slower speed, i saw the object move maybe a maximum of 10 inches from my pov in a matter of approximately 15 seconds. i had no idea what it was, and consider it a ufo.  i will never forget it - the urge to look, the perfection of the red/orange circle against the grey clouds, my mind trying to figure out what i was looking at and checking things off the list, wondering what had made me look up in the first place, and, in a weird sense, i felt a strong sense of "intention" or "purpose" in what i was seeing - it was not moving randomly, but in a perfectly straight line, and a sense of "otherness" - i don't know how else to describe it.  then - poof - it was gone in a streak of light.  i didn't feel afraid or worried - more "okay, that was...Not something normal!" i had to make an effort to not dismiss the event - i had an urge to simply toss it aside as something random and meaningless, and to forget it, don't worry about it, to go about my business as this wasn't important, etc. - but i resisted that urge and instead did the opposite - i repeated the event in my mind, and then told someone i trusted about it to help lock it in. i have a very clear picture of it in my mind even 10 years later.  thanks for listening to my story!  it was a very brief, very memorable event.
content.summary: Perfect glowing red/orange circle below grey cloud cover - appox. 1/2" diam from my pov.

content.detailedDescription: I have not reported this incident so as to not mar the memory of it. i stop in downtown huntsville, al at what is called the big spring every night on my bicycle. it's a park that i rest at 1/2 way back to where i live. i was sitting on the ground and looked up to see one round bright, white light moving slowly from the left heading right. as i watched, 2 more identical round tubes of light appeared forming a triangle. this thing moved slowly (30 mph)and had no sound whatsoever & was very close, about 50 ft up. i looked around for someone with one of those remote controllers, for i thought it was some sort of remote controlled toy. there was nobody with one & this craft was a little too big for that. i estimate it was 15ft from tail to front (the tip of the triangle). i have never looked for ufos & was not looking for one that night: i just looked up & there it was. another person witnessed this down to my far right & i heard her exclaim "oh my god!"...& something else i could'nt make out. it blinked out after about 20 seconds of flight time. i'm 40 & never imagined i'd see something like this & it has messed with my mind a little. my curiosity is killing me. i don't believe this was a secret government craft from the redstone arsenal or anything...I believe i got to see an alien visitor. thank you, (name deleted.)fg
content.summary: Small trialgle ufo with 3 round (really bright) lights underneath it

content.detailedDescription: I reported the ufo in sept. of 2009 hovering over my back yard in the bay view of san francisco.......But now this is different and its true..........They follow me when i get into a car now , these star like objects and now i see them almost every other night, if you want this on film please contact me at (phone number deleted) thank you!!
content.summary: Angelic light

content.detailedDescription: It was about 8 pm i think on january 1, 1982, my girlfriend at the time and i drove along state highway 54 outside of chapel hill. we were on a hill top going down the hill and heading back up the next hill when we saw a round lighted object sort of hovering across the road. it was about 60 feet in diameter and just sort of hung over the road it made no sound at all. as we approached it rose up into the air only about 50 feet or so. as we passed under it the inside the car turned blue and my girlfriend freaked out on me....I slowed to 10 mph...As we moved the object stayed right over us...The whoile inside of the car lite up....I rolled down my window and looked up...It was round and had bright lights...The lights seemed to change some how...As i calmed down my girlfriend and assured her we were not going to die, i got her to grab my camera and snap off a few shots of the object. as i continued to drive the cars behind me all stopped...The object stayed right on top of us as we drove along. when i turned it turned...I noticed that the on coming traffic did not move either...Traffic was light at this time....After about 15 minutes the object shot straight up at a high speed and then just went off at an angle into the darkness......We drove back to cary and went to see my girlfriends next door neighbor....He had worked on project blue book...So he seemed like the right person to talk to...He wanted my film bad...But i would not give it to him.....He left the room and i could hear him make a few calls....We left....I took the film to the drug store for processing...When i got it back...All the negatives of the object where gone...The pictures i took before the encounter and after all came out fine, but i was short by 5 negatives..Not even blanks were in the pack...I went home after leaving my girlfriends and told my dad about it...He thought i was nuts....But i he was in the air force too...And i am not sure...But i do think he worked on blue book also....I did not tell him about the pictures i had taken.....A few years ago around 2000, when i was home for a visit, my dad made a point of telling me that my experience had been report a few weeks ago in the local paper as a squad of helicopters...Now mind you...This is some 18 years after the actual event.....I know that at the time there was a small article in the paper...And some 300 people reported the sighting.....Well...That is my story...I dont tell people about it.
content.summary: Orange county encounter

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to the front of my house to retrieve something out of the car it was between 9:30 to 9:45pm,looked up to see what i thought was a police helicopter for a brief second just based on how low this object appeared to be.  the person that accompanied me as well saw this..It appeared to be rather large,unknown exact shape,bright bright white(kind of yellowish)light(s),with a distintive red light(s) underneath. it seemed as if the object was revolving slowly but still remaining in the same area. as i was,(along with the person that was with me)kept staring at this object(never looking away)started to fade away but quickly right before my eyes and the way it disappeared like that,was not in any way humanly operated,if that makes sense.  this ordeal probably lasted only for 2 to 3 minutes max. after this,my hair standed all on end and i proceeded to run back in my house. ive read about people reporting sightings all my life but never thought id be one of them. this is the second up close sighting ive seen in the past month.
content.summary: Rather large,sort of revolving object in sky,very bright white/red light(s)undermeath~highdesert!

content.detailedDescription:
I know there are going to be some who immediately dismiss this sighting as conventional aircraft. this night the skies were full of air traffic but this one caught my eye due to the strange & unconventional light formation. in this video you will see an object pass directly above me. pay close attention to the two lights off to the right side. the bottom one will get a little tricky, get brighter and move itself out to the right and further away as it passes over. not something expected to see on airplanes. as the video goes on it gets even better as more lights appear on this object. i sit and skywatch as often as i can.I have been doing so since 1998. your gut feeling tells you when you are seeing something "different". alot of others are reporting seeing these craft in the night sky that change their light formations. maybe we should stop dismissing the truth hiding in plain sight.

the video can be found on yt titled watch a ufo turn into an airplane july 13 2011 sighting under the alien agenda 2012 channel

sighting in youngstown ohio july 13, 11:50pm est. object moving east to west. to the know it all skeptics or self appointed "experts/debunkers" please do not insult my intelligence by informing me i live near vienna airforce reserve base or youngstown warren regional airport. i have lived here my whole life. i am well aware of my own surroundings and the lay of the land.

thanks for watching and please keep your eyes to the skies :))
content.summary: Watch a ufo turn into an airplane july 13 2011 sighting

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to let my dog use the toilet before i was going to bed , i walked around the pool with him and was waiting near the door for him to hurry up with his business. i looked at my phone to see what time it was and it was 10:43 , i then looked at the moon noticing it was full or really bright and out of nowhere i saw a shooting star, i made a wish and not thinking anything out of the ordinary ,i was about to head inside and all of a sudden the shooting star stopped ... like stopped stopped !!And changed direction and shot off into the distance. i was so shocked and and confused because i swear it felt like it was observing me, i noticed that when i went inside it had already been 2 minutes since i checked my phone for the time and my cell phone screen was glitchy and had like a scatterd digital look i had to take the battery out and it went back to normal!! scared the crap out of me !!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Standing out side ,then a flash sort of like a shooting star then it paused and changed direction and then turned around

content.detailedDescription: Being the eve of the 4th of july, and getting closer to midnight, i started hearing fireworks going on around town.  i was on the second floor of my home and looked out my bathroom window toward south mountain and saw fireworks going off in the distance, as i do every year.  i watched the fireworks for a few minutes and then noticed two red lights in the sky advancing from the southeast(?)from over the mountain.  i thought it was odd that two planes would be flying so close to each other.  they came closer and then there were four red lights in a straight line, one perfectly behind the other advancing in my direction.  i thought there might be a reflection from the double pane glass in my window, so i went outside and stood on the sidewalk at the street and watched the four lights.  they stopped and then the front two lights again went side-by-side.  they did not keep advancing....They remained statationary in the sky for a short time and then reverted back to their position in a straight line of four red lights.  they even seemed to retreat for a short distance.  they again advanced in my direction and the first light changed direction and went to it's left (my right facing it) toward the south.  it then just disappeared.  it did not just disappear from sight because i lost sight of it due to distance....It just wasn't there anymore.  the other three red lights were also gone.  i waited but they did not appear again and i went back inside my home.  this is the first time i had seen something that i considered to be an ufo.  i was fascinated watching the lights and wondered if anyone else was seeing them.  i thought that all the fireworks going off all over the u.S. had probably attracted them.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 round red lights in the sky switching positions and directions

content.detailedDescription: I was walking through the cemetery taking photos of damage from the earthquake. i took a short series of photos and when i looked through them later there was an abnormally in two photos. the object doesn't line up with any know flight pattern of airplanes in the country. i have attached the photo to this report
content.summary: I saw the object in a photo i took from the cemetery

content.detailedDescription:
Was sleeping downstairs because storms earlier in the day had knocked out power. woke up at an unknown hour to use the bathroom and upon laying back down on the floor in my family room noticed that there was a light shining across the cieling of my dinning room. i was really tired and didn't think much of it and the light went off after a minute or so.

the i remembered that the power was out in my entire neighborhood (and across large portions of northen ill and southern wi.

i should also note that my house backs up to a natural area and the nearest house in the direction (east) of the sliding door to the dinning room is several hundred feet.

i cannot shake the feeling that this was something unusual given the hour and location of the light. i only wished i had come to my senses sooner.

the hour i listed as seeing the light is a total guess as no clocks were running. when i got up after realizing that this was unusual, the sky was very clear, in fact the clearest i can remember in a long time as there was no light pollution due to the power outage.
content.summary: Light seen while power was out

content.detailedDescription:
Me and martha scott went to the haven fireworks at the island (old irish flats)at 9:00pm. after the fireworks we were walking to the parking lot
at end of garfield ave and burger st. as i was approaching my jeep i was
immediately struck by something bright red and traveling almost over our heads. my first thought was: "more fireworks" but there was no sound.
typical of a ufo and those i'd seen over orwigsburg on 9/11 2003. my camcorder did not reveal any details as it was hard to keep steady 
without a tripod. freeze frame reveals an oval bright object. i watched it
for about 10 minutes and noticed that it was not heading towards the horizon as aircraft do but like a rocket would do it heading for outer space. let me be specific! this object accelerated from 1 mile up to
invisible in 20 seconds. 

        it shot right out of our atmosphere. i have to laugh at this one. was it the fireworks that attracted these ships? were they also watching them from a distance. whatever direction this came from i did not see it walking back (probably cause i just wasn't looking up). judging from the direction it came when i saw it it was coming in the direction of feeser's
cement company.Also amusing is the fact that there were groups of people standing in the parking lot by their cars had no idea this thing was
even there till i yelled "hey thats a ufo up there". then they looked up and because it made no noise two of them said: "what is that thing"
from time to time i have seen objects that you would swear were ufo's but
after waiting for the object to get close or using binoculars you clearly
see blinking navigation lights and a sound. this object had a red glow and no navigation lights or sound. the only thing we have that goes straight up and out of the atmosphere are rockets. the behaviour of this
object does not qualify as anything manmade and i have little reason to think that it is secret government technology either.
content.summary: A bright red object traveling about  50-75 mph over schuylkill haven

content.detailedDescription:
There were similar events that took place in my life, but this one tops them all imo - this was about a couple of years ago, 2-3 months after we came back from the hospital after my son was born...

it was about 11:20ish 11:30 at night and my wife and 2 month old son were fast asleep - i was done doing some things on the computer and went to go to bed. coming out of the room where the computer was located, you crossed a small area before going into the bedroom. it was there that i felt a little something in the air (best way to describe it) i was very familiar with this feeling and kinda knew what the deal was...

i felt threatened... i knew something was up, or something was outside, so i walked out to the kitchen area and kinda talked to myself or it - saying "alright - you better bounce.... i'm not going for this tonight." 

i felt like there was something outside waiting for me to go to sleep. 

so i was getting tired and thought it was just the feeling. so i go to bed, my wife had a little night light on for the baby just in case she had to get up. 

now my son really didn't wake us up much, which was good.


so i'm laying there - i look at the clock - it was 11:50ish - i start the fade to sleep and the whole room seems to dim a bit. i could remember feeling a paralyzed feeling over my body. and was scared straight. 

i felt as though someone walked in from behind me through the door. so i'm laying there and felt this feeling - i moved my fingers a little and was surprised that i could move them - i've been paralyzed in bed before, but it noticed i could move my arm a little. i reach behind my back slowly and grabbed what felt like a skinny, long-fingered, child's hand.

no joke!

as soon as i grabbed it - it started pulling away like a child would - i let go of that hand so fast!!! man!

i couldn't move. the lights dimmed and lit back to normal. (if that makes sense) 

i got up it was 12:10 or so. so that's when i got really scared - i know i didn't fall asleep in 20 mins and dream!! 

 - prayed hard - and went to sleep after an hour or so - 
i can post more similar stories.
content.summary: Actual encounter

content.detailedDescription:
12:37 am  13 july 2011.
went to my music studio from my home, went to get a few studio items then on way back in looked up and seen 3 bright (orange/yellow) objects.  one large, other two half size of big object.  the two small objects were going up to the big object, two times, then kinda freaked out then went in house, got my canon eos lsr pro camera and video cameral along with my parents.  the three of us watched the two small objects go up to the big object many times, they flickered a bit and after 20 mins they all went away.  no way were the objects, fireworks, flars, or known craft.  they were ball type at my point of view...  our studio house ranch is out in the country and on a hill, we view the jordan valley clear.  very odd and people need to know this event.
thanks
andrew
content.summary: Mile or less

content.detailedDescription:
I was photographing parque da indepencia in sao paulo (brazil) on july 9th 2011 as a tourist, and saw a worm-like shape shifting ufo 30 minutes after leaving the park (i've made that mufon report before).

i decided to go back to the photos i took that day, to see if i can find the ufo on pictures i took in the park, and sure enough, it was visible on two photograph backgrounds, taken about 30 minutes before i saw the thing right above me on my way back to the train station.

what is interesting is that, based on the direction the ufo is coming from in these pictures, it made a hard right turn on the exact point where i took my photographs of it later (at ipiranga cptm station).

the photos are as they were taken, i only added an arrow (with ms paint) to point out the location of the ufo in the background.
content.summary: Sao paulo/parque da indepencia ufo on touristy photos background 30 minutes before i saw it right above me.

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday, i was on my way home from a friends house when i spotted something odd. i was driving east down 40th avenue and i spotted a light. this was like no man made light, it did not give off any sort of glow and was very bright. as i turned onto 240th street heading north i tried to get a better look at the light, but i kept losing it in the trees and houses to the east. but then came a clearing to the east where i could truly see this was not man made. i made a right onto robertson crescent heading east again. that's when it really hit me, this..Thing..Was much closer than i expected. as i neared it, i could really see all the lights that were a part of this object. i'm not saying this object was a triangle shape, but the lights on the bottom made it look like a triangle. a very bright light on each corner. as i neared even closer i realized it wasn't moving what-so-ever and was completely silent. this was no helicopter. i was about to go directly underneath the object. when i did, i decreased my speed to a crawl, looked up and seen a flurry in the middle of the craft. a flurry which consisted of about 6 very bright different colored lights. as i passed it, and came to the stop sign at robertson & 248th street, i looked behind me and did not see it. i thought it was gone and would not see it again. as i headed north up 248th, i looked to the west and seen it about a kilometer away moving decently slow heading north. i couldn't take my eyes off of it. then it really spooked me, it started making very erratic movements. dashing from spot to spot in the sky. as i continued up 248th, i tried looking, but there was way too many trees to see. i stopped looking and headed home. i was in too much shock to go on. it was hard even to think about it. it was unlike anything i have ever experienced. the experience gave me a very gross feeling, like nothing matters in this world. we know nothing of the world out there. our planet is a very small peice of the puzzle we call existence.
content.summary: Triangle shaped flying object(by the light formation) in langley, bc

content.detailedDescription: This event occurred during the early hours of the morning on monday, july 11, 2011. i was camping at a camp ground near an outdoor festival just outside of veneta, oregon. having watched the firedancing events of the evening up until their very end at approximately 2am, i decided to take a walk through the dark, quiet camp ground before heading to bed. many other campers were still awake at this time, partying and such, and i wandered for quite some time, mostly in nearly pitch black conditions. as i crossed an open field i spotted a small cluster of people ahead of me in the dark, all of whom appeared to be huddled together and pointing to something in the sky through a gap in the trees. as i came closer i could hear them asking one another, "what is that?" "is it a meteor?" "haha, is it a sign of the end times?" one of them beckoned to me, saying "come see the ufo!" as i approached i was able to see through the same gap in the treeline which they were looking through. the sky was uniformly overcast, with thick grey clouds hanging low and glowing a dim amber colour due to night time light pollution from the nearby city of eugene. hanging there beneath the clouds, at least forty-five degrees above the horizon, brighter by far than any of the faint air traffic which i could just barely see near the horizon, was a single brilliant point of amber-coloured light. it made no sound, had none of the external flashing lights required by the faa, and was most certainly not a star, as no others were visible anywhere in the observable sky at the time. though it did eventually move, it appeared to be still for the majority of the time. it appeared, at its maximum luminosity, to be about the size of a penny held at arm's length. having observed meteors, fireballs and other atmospheric events as an amateur astronomer, as well as many different types of aircraft and flares as an avid aviation, maritime and military enthusiast, i could say with certainty at the time that what we saw did not fit within the normal frame of reference concerning what "should" be in the sky. its brightness was a shocking contrast to the dim, cloudy sky surrounding it. as we stood together observing and contemplating what the strange, floating light source could be, it began to drift very subtly from north to south, first dimming slightly, then glowing even brighter than before. this was vociferously observed by those of us on the ground. about sixty seconds or so later, it dimmed once more, glowed again, and them shrank into a single dim white point which quickly vanished, leaving only a smooth and unblemished cloud cover behind. shocked, we continued to look for the object for a few more minutes, but it seemed that the light wasn't going to come back, and some of the other observers were quite shaken by the event. having never seen a ufo before and suddenly being confronted with the idea that extra-terrestrials might be real, several of them revealed through conversation feelings of deep vulnerability and fear. others seemed intrigued. having seen unexplainable things in the sky before, i felt excited and somewhat intrigued by the reactions of my newfound companions. the punchline: i had a camera phone in my pocket and plenty of time to use it, but between my excitement and my strong desire to observe and remember every relevant detail i possibly could, i totally forgot it was there, and did not snap a photo/video of the object.
content.summary: A burning orb floating beneath the cloud cover which glowed at different intensities and then vanished

content.detailedDescription: In july got born again in church feeling like beings doing surgury on me at night being followed by govt, have been hit by bullets seing my self outside myself like a walkin inside of me, being tortured by these beings, feeling like soul and spirit outside of body with handcuffs and tape all over me nighttime seeing needles all over me with alien writing on them and serum inside of me. they are trying to capture my soul and annointing power of the spirit inside of me seeing space like quaranteeine around a 20 feet radius aound me, my life is in dangr please pray for me michael thanks. seeing 20 ft ufo following me and triangel like black aircraft also seeing remote viewers trying to tap inside of my spiritman to take the annointing of god over. thanks.
content.summary: Have seen 4 ufo being experimented on at night terrified

content.detailedDescription:
We were walking through the park, taking pictures as we always do of nature, trees, clouds and sun shining through trees and sometimes animals as well.  towards the end of our walk i wanted to take a few more pictures of the sun because on our last walk i had done this and the sun shone through the trees very dinstinctly and made really neat pictures.

we had not noticed that the camera captured an image (octagon type) until we downloaded the pictures onto the computer, then looking at them closer, we noticed that the object also seemed to be moving.

we decided to zoom into the object and in one of them, noticed that there seems to also be an image inside the octogonal shape.

upon checking the camera, we found that it was not on any special image setting/feature.  all the other pictures were normal from what we could tell.  none of the pictures have been digitally enhanced or messed with in any way.
content.summary: Object not visibly seen , moved through series of photos taken on a walk in the park.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a light in the sky that was far off,as i was traveling home about 14 miles from home at that time,and as i was going it was moving it was low from my viewpoint,and on my way we were getting closer to each other.
at one point i was maybe 4 miles from it and thought it was a single light
but getting closer i could see two lights side by side and by then i had driven probably 11 or 12 miles and was going around a bend in the road and there was a hill on my left,and there were trees blocking my view,i knew i was going to turn left at the next turn coming up,but as i was getting ready to turn i started to scan the sky and looked out and up,and by this time it was about dusk dark,and seen something that had ab absolutely no busyness being there,against the sky i could see all it's features,it was enormous 
and had to have weighed a million tons triangular in shape,it was as high off the ground as it was long,i guess it was about 375 to 400 feet long by about
275 to 350 wide.
it had what i would say was a portal in the middle,surrounded by clear domes
seven or eight and looked like they were about nine or ten inches thick,the 
portal was big enough to accept a 1600 sq,ft,brick rancher style house with a carport on the end.
i knocked the three speed on the tree,out of gear and locked on the emergency brake,and was on the ground on my feet in a second or two,it was parallel to
my truck and going in the opposite direction about one hundred and twenty or one hundred and fifty feet from my side.
i tried to pop my ears,by opening my mouth,like going over a mountain or like on a plane to try to hear any sound and all i could hear was the noise from my truck ,muffled exhaust,fan,and a loose hydrolic lifter.
from the 1971 ford,300 straight six cylinder motor,pretty quite.
even went ten or twelve feet away from the truck,to better distinguish the
the noise level,no difference.
this thing owned the sky, it went about as fast as a bicycle,and didn't seem to care if anyone saw it or not,i thought it was the end of the world.
my brain was racing,what about my family,was this the only one,were there more,what should i do,it was getting away,i took off after it,i wanted for any one else to see it,blowing my horn and flashing my lights.And it was gone.
next thing i know,i am sliding into my driveway.
ran into the house,i was babbling like a fool,i was going to show my wife.
yeah right,there was nothing to show her except the heat gauge on my truck
and some long weeds hanging from my back bumper.
it's been a long while back,but everything looks different from then till now,and i know i will never be the same.
content.summary: On my way home from work

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my back yard showing my dad where i had actually seen a ufo over the easter weekend a few months ago. i pointed up to the sky to show him where i'd seen it and as soon as i pointed up we saw coming from north to south. it looked like a commercial jet flanked by 3 grey/silver looking balls. there were 2 on one side and 1 on the other. they were flying in a very deliberate formation around the jet and keeping pace with it perfectly. as it got closer we saw 3 more grey/silver balls simply appear out of thin air and completed the formation around the jet. it was a very symmetrical formation with 2 on either side cropped in close to the plane and 1 on each side farther out wide and behind the jet. they  were in a very distinct "v" shape.
they all just flew over my house and then there were out of sight.
that is the 3rd time in 3 or 4 months that i have witnessed some kind of ufo from just my own back yard.

i do live close to an air force base. it's just north of me over the river in vancouver, wa
maybe that has something to do with it?
content.summary: 6 tiny silverish ball looking things

content.detailedDescription: Saw a bright red light come over the mountain near deruyter lake from the direction of cazenovia in upstate ny. as it climbed and bank slowly i could see 4 red lights in each corner. lights were steady. no other lights. it made no noise. as big as a plane, but really difficult to see the craft. we hear and see planes all the time. this was not a plane. as it went aross the sky it suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: 4 red lights in each corner. craft silent. as large as a jet.

content.detailedDescription:
Halloween night, 2010. was out walking with friends who were escorting their children while out trick-or-treating. clear sky.

happened to look up and noticed venus high in the sky. then something else caught my eye. it was a pill-capsule shaped, luminous object that was moving from south to north. estimated altitude about 2000-3000 feet (best guess). the ufo was "staggering" across the sky as it traveled. it was traveling at maybe about 100 knots (estimated, based on the rates of travel of some light aircraft i also observed in the viscinity), and it was changing course as it moved. it did not appear to change altitude, only course. the changes appeared random, and did not seem to involve changes to airspeed. the best way i can think of to describe its motion was that it was flying as if it was drunk -- following the same general path, but with many course corrections. i was able to track it for a few minutes before it passed beyond the horizon. one other witness also saw it, and in fact asked, seriously, "are you watching the ufo?"

at first, i thought it might have been something else until i realized that it looked exactly like one i had previously reported to mufon a couple years ago that i saw in august of 1976 over henry country, georgia. it was reported via this same form (although the other form had more options), under the same name and email, so it should be in the records, although i do not know the case number.
content.summary: Pill-capsule shaped luminous ufo meandering across sky.

content.detailedDescription: Saw something flying through the sky on saturday, july 9, 2011 that i did not recognize. it was early afternoon and it flew a bit above the horizon, slowly through the clouds. i say slowly, but i guess that's hard to determine. it covered a lot of ground, in a relatively short time. i could easily follow it as i was driving north on i-75 sometime between 2 and 3 pm. looked like nothing i've seen flying before. very angular and gray looking, kind of rectangle in shape, wasn't small either. it moved very precisely, for lack of a better term. it was flying east.
content.summary: Angular looking, gray in color. low flying, moving slightly above horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside for a cigarette this morning at around 4:25 am before bed. immediately, a white light caught my eye in the sky. it was too big and too bright to be a star and it hung in the sky completely motionless as far as i know. it did not appear to move at all. after a few minutes of watching it, i finished my cigarette and went back inside my home. a few minutes later, i was curious to see if it was still there, and sure enough it was. i decided to get my camera and film it. i will attach the video to my report. i made two similar videos of it and snapped a few pictures of it. it's actually still visible as i type this. (it is 5:23 am as i type this). i know for a fact that it isn't a star because i have never seen it there before and i am one to watch the skies for lights on a nightly basis. it is simply unexplainable.
content.summary: Simple white light in sky
